vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H6743B', 'matchingForm': 'צָלֵחַ', 'stepTransliteration': 'tsa.le.ach', 'gloss': 'to prosper', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亨通, 就必亨通', '_es_Gloss': 'prosperado', '_zh_Gloss': '亨通, 就必亨通'}, {'strongNumber': 'H6744', 'matchingForm': 'צְלַח', 'stepTransliteration': 'tse.lach', 'gloss': 'to prosper', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '得享亨通, 亨通', '_es_Gloss': 'prosperado', '_zh_Gloss': '得享亨通, 亨通'}]
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (Qal) 奔騰, 急忙行進
2) 進階, 昌盛
2a) (Qal) 昌盛, 成功
2b) (Hiphil)
2b1) 使昌盛, 帶來成功的結果, 致使興旺
2b2) 展現或經驗昌盛
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) (Qal) 奔腾, 急忙行进
2) 进阶, 昌盛
2a) (Qal) 昌盛, 成功
2b) (Hiphil)
2b1) 使昌盛, 带来成功的结果, 致使兴旺
2b2) 展现或经验昌盛

vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H6743A', 'matchingForm': 'צָלַח', 'stepTransliteration': 'tsa.lach', 'gloss': 'to rush', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亨通, 就必亨通', '_es_Gloss': 'prosperado', '_zh_Gloss': '亨通, 就必亨通'}, {'strongNumber': 'H6744', 'matchingForm': 'צְלַח', 'stepTransliteration': 'tse.lach', 'gloss': 'to prosper', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '得享亨通, 亨通', '_es_Gloss': 'prosperado', '_zh_Gloss': '得享亨通, 亨通'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to advance, prosper, make progress, succeed, be profitable
1a) (Qal) to prosper
1b) (Hiphil)
1b1) to make prosperous, bring to successful issue, cause to prosper
1b2) to show or experience prosperity, prosper
Aramaic equivalent: tse.lach (צְלַח "to prosper" H6744)
§ 1) to advance, prosper, make progress, succeed, be profitable
1a) (Qal) to prosper
1b) (Hiphil)
1b1) to make prosperous, bring to successful issue, cause to prosper
1b2) to show or experience prosperity, prosper
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   entrar en, ser eficiente; (b)   tener éxito, ser exitoso; (c) hif.   hacer prosperar; (d)   tener éxito
